name: characterological
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to character or the study of character: This problem does seem to be a characterological flaw in the candidate. These distant family similarities were sometimes not purely physical but characterological as well.
More examplesFewer examplesAmbitious aides could not simply exploit the president's characterological weaknesses.It was widely believed that criminal or antisocial behaviour was characterological and innate, and the individual was genetically doomed.We discussed the characterological implications of those narrative details for the story.
